item.description:
Lake Attitash located partly in Amesbury and partly in Merrimack MA has an area of 360 acres. The lake is used for swimming, boating and fishing. Jetskiing is prohibited. Lake Attitash offers a great oportunity for birders as well as fishing.

This event is open to all types of kayaks as well as canoes

Life Vests aka PFDs must be worn at all times to paddle with this group

Directions:
From NH take I-95 South to Rt. 495, take exit 54 Rt. 150 Ext. Turn right off of ramp onto Rt. 150. Then turn left heading west on Route 110. Attitash Ave. is 2.3 miles on right. It's just after a bait shop on the right. Follow the road until it ends at the boat ramp near Bison ln. & Indian Head Park.

Google Maps directions to Lake Attitash Boat Launch
item.name: Lake Attitash Paddle Amesbury MA
